sentence.Network_en: The outer skin of the orange is called the "zest".
Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.

sentence.Network_en: She wrote com-pellingly, with great zest.
sentence.Network_cn: 她满怀热情，饶有兴致地写着。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from French zeste 'orange or lemon peel', of unknown origin

encyclopedia.content: Zest(The Eclipse Visualization Toolkit) 是在 Eclipse 平台基础上开发的一套可视化图形构件集合，方便开发和 UML 相关的图形应用程序，但范围不限于 UML 相关的应用，也可以用来开发工作流程图形化建模，树状结构图等。本文的示例代码都是以开发简单工作流程图形建模为例子。 Zest 库是从 SWT 和 Draw2D 扩展开发而来，可以无缝的集成到 Eclipse 的应用当中。因为 Zest 是基于 SWT(JFace) 的，所以 Zest 遵循 Eclipse 平台视图

entry.def: Zest is a feeling of pleasure and enthusiasm.

example.ex: He retired from professional chess because he had lost the zest for winning...
example.tran: 他退出了职业国际象棋赛场，因为他已经对获胜毫无兴致。

example.ex: He has a zest for life and a quick intellect.
example.tran: 他对生活充满热情，思维敏捷。

entry.tran: （活动或情形的）乐趣，趣味，刺激性
entry.def: Zest is a quality in an activity or situation which you find exciting.

example.ex: Live interviews add zest and a touch of the unexpected to any piece of research.
example.tran: 现场采访会为各种调查增添趣味性和些许新奇感。

example.ex: ...the zest and charm of this beautiful comic opera.
example.tran: 这出精彩的喜歌剧的诙谐和魅力

entry.def: The zest of a lemon, orange, or lime is the outer skin when it is used to give flavour to something such as a cake or a drink.

example.ex: Mix the rest of the olive oil with the zest and juice of the lemon...
example.tran: 将其余的橄榄油和柠檬皮及柠檬汁混合在一起。

example.ex: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
example.tran: 将橙皮擦出大约一茶匙的细末待用。

sentences.en: We tucked into the food with zest.

means.word_mean: 极大的快乐或兴奋;热情;兴趣

sentences.cn: 他满腔热情地参加了运动。

sentences.en: He is 74 years old but still full of zest.
sentences.cn: 他 74 岁了，但仍充满激情。

sentences.en: Last month’s victory has given him a renewed zest for the game.
sentences.cn: 上个月的胜利重新唤起他对这项运动的热情。

means.word_mean: 增加的兴趣、风味、魅力等(的性质)

sentences.en: The love affair added a little zest to her life.
sentences.cn: 这次恋爱给她的生命增添了一些生趣。
